data.actual_result: A second message in the text box appears after the first one, with your edit.
data.expected_result: The message should be correctly edited and Discord should not let you offer a second message.
data.short_description: Editing a message and turning around your device will cause a second message to appear.
data.steps_to_repro: - Start editing a message - Add something to the message - Turn your device (flipping the screen) - Press the submit button
